document_data.name: Larkell Greenspring
document_data.History: In 1367 DR, Larkell Greenspring and [[Trover]] escorted Constable [[Tren Noemfor|Tren]]'s envoy [[Marrakt]] to meet a just-arrived-in-town adventuring party.
document_data.Personality: Larkell was a seasoned veteran, not easily intimidated by others.
